question.text: You are travelling at the legal speed limit. A vehicle comes up quickly behind, flashing its headlights. You should

explanation.text: Don’t enforce the speed limit by blocking another vehicle’s progress. This will only lead to the other driver becoming more frustrated. Allow the other vehicle to pass when you can do so safely.

answer.text: accelerate to make a gap behind you
touch the brakes sharply to show your brake lights
maintain your speed to prevent the vehicle from overtaking
